alert.note: Alert for Garden; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 7:37PM CDT until August 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTHERN GARDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 637 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Ellsworth to 7 miles east of Antioch, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Rackett, Patterson Lake, Deer Lake, Britton Lake, Kincaid Lake, Kennedy Lake, Wild Horse Flats, Miles Lake, Snow Lake, Mumper, Wickson Lake, Lakeside, Herman Lake, Jerry Lake, Adams Flats, Krause Lake and Tralnor Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 8. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 129. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
